comments:
I tried to open an html page on GTK. The editor that opened had the below error.
There was a general statement about the browser not being available or not
configured properly but there was no hint as to how the proper configuration
could be done. I did go to the Web Browser preference page and noticed that the
"Use Internal Browser" was selected but disabled (i.e. I could select another
options but not reselect the internal browser). I should think that the external
browser should be used by default in my case (since the system seems capable of
determining that the internal browser isn't available). It would be nice to have
an explanation of how to obtain and configure the internal browser as well.
